cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 305 mi SSE of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: Slowly north-northwest today, turning west-northwest Monday and accelerating northwest across the northern Yucatan Peninsula and into the central Gulf of Mexico, aiming toward the central Gulf Coast (LA-MS coastal area) by late Wednesday.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Gulf Coast near the LA-MS border

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Tulum to Rio Lagartos, Mexico including Cozumel
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning for Pinar del Rio, Cuba
weather_observation.impacted_coast: western Cuba, northern Yucatan Peninsula, and central Gulf Coast (Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama)
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at Boston, MA based on current forecast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant system could bring 1-2 inches of rain late week, but heavy totals are not anticipated.
